Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.server.model.board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.server.model.board.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
The board of the game containing information about all the cells and exposing functions to get and update their state.

  • Method Details

    • getTowerSize

      public int getTowerSize​(Point pos)
      Get the height of a tower, in number of levels.
      Parameters:
      pos - the coordinates of the cell
      Returns:
      the tower size of the selected cell

    • incrementTowerSize

      public void incrementTowerSize​(Point pos) throws TowerSizeException, java.io.IOException
      Increase by one level the height of a tower.
      Parameters:
      pos - the coordinates of the cell
      Throws:
      TowerSizeException - when you can't increase a tower size
      TowerSizeException - if the tower is higher than 3 levels
      java.io.IOException - if it cant notify the controller

    • setAsCompleted

      public void setAsCompleted​(Point pos) throws java.io.IOException
      Mark the selected tower as complete, meaning it has to be treated as if there was a dome on it.
      Parameters:
      pos - the coordinates of the cell
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if it can't notify the controller

    • getIsCompleted

      public boolean getIsCompleted​(Point pos)
      Returns true if the tower is completed (has a dome on it), false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      pos - the coordinates of the cell
      Returns:
      whether the tower is complete
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the cell is outside the board

    • isValidPos

      public static boolean isValidPos​(Point pos)
      Tells if the provided Point is inside the board
      Parameters:
      pos - the Point to check
      Returns:
      the validity of the point
